group.name: Using JDO 1.0
group.note: The Java Data Objects (JDO) API is a standard interface-based Java model abstraction of persistence, developed as Java Specification Request 12. Application programmers use JDO to directly store their Java domain model instances into the persistent store (database). Uses Java Data Object Query Language (JDOQL).
